content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":61230,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ad99137c-9967-450a-8536-b52ccf288272/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/ad99137c-9967-450a-8536-b52ccf288272/5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"5.PNG\",\"name\":\"5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"ad99137c-9967-450a-8536-b52ccf288272\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":271.7004421962781},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What is a Complex Engagement?\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In laymen's terms, “Complex” is a usually used to describe something that has many details and interconnected parts. “Complex” is often used interchangeably with “complicated”. However, at EPAM, we have distinguished these two terms from each other in order to specifically describe the nature of an engagements (for our purposes, an engagement can be a project or a program of projects).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A complex engagement\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is one with enough ambiguity and unknown factors that there is no clear solution and/or no clear path to a solution. Complex engagements operate under uncertainty. They are the engagements where we are navigating through uncharted waters and the lack of definitives make rigid rules or processes inappropriate. Often these engagements require the adaptive collaboration of multiple departments and/or competencies to make headway towards a potential solution.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A complicated engagemen\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"t is one that is difficult, multifaceted and requires diligent management, however, enough is known about the solution, that we can apply rules, recipes, processes and methods to achieve the desired outcome. Complicated engagements often operate at a large scale. They require strong expertise and management to establish the path to the solution.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Complex and complicated engagements are not mutually exclusive. They can exist simultaneously or one can lead into the other. A complex engagement can become complicated once clarity is brought to the solution and it requires diligent and precise management to execute. A complicated engagement can become complex if we learn that we’ll have to take unknown factors into consideration that now cloud our understanding towards a solution. An engagement can simultaneously be both complex and complicated when there are multiple layers to a solution, where some parts are known well enough to be developed but require expert management to execute, while other parts are still unknown and require innovative collaboration to navigate.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
